attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
Based on information submitted to the MLS GRID as of 2024-01-24 10:55:15 PST. All data is obtained from various sources and may not have been verified by broker or MLS GRID. Supplied Open House Information is subject to change without notice. All information should be independently reviewed and verified for accuracy. Properties may or may not be listed by the office/agent presenting the information. Some IDX listings have been excluded from this website. [Click here for more information](/info/mls-disclaimers/#mls_87)

The Listing Brokerage’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed and to participants of an MLS subject to a data-access agreement with Canopy MLS.

attributionInfo.brokerName: United Country Real Estate Carolina Properties

data.description: Charming three bedroom two bathroom ranch style home for sale in Gastonia! Step into a bright and inviting living space featuring a cozy brick fireplace with a traditional white molding mantle. Enjoy the warmth of the rustic-style kitchen adorned with retro wood cabinetry. The laundry area is equipped with ample space for full size high efficiency appliances and storage ensuring convenience in your daily routine. This home is situated on a quarter-acre lot, offering a space for outdoor activities. Relax on the enclosed sun-filled porch, providing a serene space for morning coffees or quiet evenings. With close proximity to grocery stores, shopping centers, restaurants, downtown Gastonia, and easy access to I-85, convenience is at your doorstep. Don't miss the opportunity to make this house your home! Schedule your showing today!
